name: TARGET
description: TARGET is a shooting gallery. Yes, yes, the most common! Shoot on moving targets from more than 10 weapons - pistols, shotgune, rifle, machine gun, sniper rifle, bazooka and even hand grenades. For accurate hits you will receive points that you can buy ammunition, or buy a new trunk. Train your accuracy in the dash, then apply your skills to shooting marks in other, more serious games!
